alert.note: Alert for Jefferson; Lewis; Oswego (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Lake Effect Snow Warning issued February 18 at 10:28PM EST until February 19 at 6:00PM EST by NWS Buffalo
info.description: ...LAKE EFFECT SNOW WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 7 AM TO 6 PM EST SATURDAY... * WHAT...Heavy lake effect snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 5 to 10 inches in the most persistent lake snows on the Tug Hill. Winds gusting as high as 50 mph. * WHERE...The Eastern Lake Ontario Region. * WHEN...From 7 AM to 6 PM EST Saturday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult to impossible where lake effect bands are most persistent. Areas of blowing and drifting snow will significantly reduce visibility. Experimental content below...do not use operationally To view the experimental polygons please see: http://www.weather.gov/buf/lespolygon COORD...4392 7545 4401 7550 4406 7597 4386 7631 4367 7623 4356 7580 4345 7555 4350 7542 4366 7542 4373 7553 TIME Y22M02D19T1200Z-Y22M02D19T1800Z COORD...4370 7538 4376 7555 4381 7559 4382 7575 4378 7600 4367 7623 4361 7623 4349 7569 4352 7556 4363 7537 TIME Y22M02D19T1800Z-Y22M02D19T2300Z
info.instruction: Heavy snow will fall in relatively narrow bands. If traveling, be prepared for rapidly changing road conditions and visibilities. Submit snow reports through our website or social media.
